page.title: 08Swainston Manor today.
page.content: At present Swainston Manor is a{Hotel {and Restaurant.}There are about 40 rooms in the manor,14 of which are guest bedrooms, each with a private bathroom,and a further 12 are used for staff accommodation. The Manor has 22 staff, many of whom live in.It costs from Â£19.50 for bed and breakfast for one night.Swainston has a private heated swimming pool in the basement.A large proportion of the guests come from overseas,including people from as far away as Australia and America. Some arrive by air and use the helicopter landing station in the grounds. A number of events are held at the manor throughout the year and these include{conferences, wedding {receptions and antiques fairs.}
